theMarked:ArtifactOfAir.NAME: Static Bracelet
theMarked:ArtifactOfAir.FLAVOR: Bestowed by the Goddess of Air.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #yCharge.

theMarked:DemonDagger.NAME: Demon Dagger
theMarked:DemonDagger.FLAVOR: As used in rituals to seal away demons.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you apply #yBanish each turn, apply #b2 more.

theMarked:Gun.NAME: Gun
theMarked:Gun.FLAVOR: A rare and valuable weapon among the Hirudians.
DESCRIPTIONS: Limits Charge consumption on attacks to #b3 without effecting damage.

theMarked:NailFile.NAME: Nail File
theMarked:NailFile.FLAVOR: It once belonged to a dangerous beauty hailing from Schimmerklamm.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #yBanish is lethal on a non-minion, heal #b10 Health.

theMarked:KettuFlask.NAME: Kettu Flask
theMarked:KettuFlask.FLAVOR: Only the Kettu know how it works... Or if it works at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you kill a Monster, gain #b13 #yBlock.

theMarked:VonisonLock.NAME: Vonison Lock
theMarked:VonisonLock.FLAVOR: A lock from the mane of Hirudia's noble mounts.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yDexterity at the end of the first #b3 turns in combat.

theMarked:SecretDocuments.NAME: Secret Documents
theMarked:SecretDocuments.FLAVOR: Sought after by those who wish to learn about Demonology.

theMarked:BronzeBlade.NAME: Bronze Blade
theMarked:BronzeBlade.FLAVOR: A product of the finest blacksmith in Ebenerz.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yStatic #yBracelet. At the start of your turn, gain #b10 #yVigor.

theMarked:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
theMarked:Eyepatch.FLAVOR: One can only guess what hides beneath.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you suffer from a negative effect, gain [E] .

theMarked:Winder.NAME: Winder
theMarked:Winder.FLAVOR: Synonymous with one of Hirudia's least desirable professions.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your draw pile, gain #b10 Charge.

theMarked:SpiritSword.NAME: Spirit Sword
theMarked:SpiritSword.FLAVOR: The deadly familiar of a Tausrean Soldier.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you summon an existing card from your deck, it costs #b0 this turn.

theMarked:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theMarked:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theMarked:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theMarked:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
